metadata.description: Ariel Chylde, the girl who can become the creatures from her many nightmares, seeks salvation and a cure for her curse following the deadly events in Salem! Collected for the first time comes the fan favorite 'Legacy' and 'Redemption' storylines, with brand new art, and cover gallery by RANDY QUEEN. MAY NOT BE SUITABLE FOR ALL AGES
metadata.name: Darkchylde
